verses.verse: וַנֵּ֜פֶן <S%H6437><s%> Then we turned וַנִּסַּ֤ע <S%H5265><s%> and took our journey הַמִּדְבָּ֙רָה֙ <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea ס֔וּף <S%H5488><s%> of the Red כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me וַנָּ֥סָב <S%H5437><s%> unto me and we compassed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mount שֵׂעִ֖יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> many ס
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> unto me saying

רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> long enough לָכֶ֕ם סֹ֖ב <S%H5437><s%> Ye have compassed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> this mountain הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this פְּנ֥וּ <S%H6437><s%> turn לָכֶ֖ם צָפֹֽנָה׃ <S%H6828><s%> you northward

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> thou the people צַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> And command לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> You עֹֽבְרִ֗ים <S%H5674><s%> Ye [are] to pass בִּגְבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> through the coast אֲחֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> of your brethren בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> which dwell בְּשֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> in Seir וְיִֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> and they shall be afraid מִכֶּ֔ם <S%H4480><s%> at וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8104><s%> heed מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> of you take ye good

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתְגָּר֣וּ <S%H1624><s%> Meddle בָ֔ם כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> not with them for I will not give לָכֶם֙ מֵֽאַרְצָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> you of their land עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> even מִדְרַ֣ךְ <S%H4096><s%> breadth כַּף־ <S%H3709><s%> branch רָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> no not so much as a foot כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because יְרֻשָּׁ֣ה <S%H3425><s%> [for] a possession לְעֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> unto Esau נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> because I have given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> mount שֵׂעִֽיר׃ <S%H8165><s%> Seir

אֹ֣כֶל <S%H400><s%> meat תִּשְׁבְּר֧וּ <S%H7666><s%> Ye shall buy מֵֽאִתָּ֛ם <S%H853><s%> בַּכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of them for money וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֑ם <S%H398><s%> that ye may eat וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> shall also מַ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> water תִּכְר֧וּ <S%H3739><s%> and ye shall also buy מֵאִתָּ֛ם <S%H853><s%> בַּכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of them for money וּשְׁתִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H8354><s%> that ye may drink

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בֵּֽרַכְךָ֗ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> thee in all the works יָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thy hand יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> he knoweth לֶכְתְּךָ֔ <S%H1980><s%> your wanderings אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּדְבָּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> wilderness הַגָּדֹ֖ל <S%H1419><s%> through this great הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this זֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> These אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> these forty שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> years יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not חָסַ֖רְתָּ <S%H2637><s%> [hath been] with thee thou hast lacked דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> nothing

וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֞ר <S%H5674><s%> And when we passed מֵאֵ֧ת <S%H854><s%> for אַחֵ֣ינוּ <S%H251><s%> by from our brethren בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children עֵשָׂ֗ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בְּשֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> in Seir מִדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> through the way הָֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <S%H6160><s%> of the plain מֵאֵילַ֖ת <S%H359><s%> from Elath וּמֵעֶצְיֹ֣ן גָּ֑בֶר <S%H6100><s%> and from Eziongaber ס וַנֵּ֙פֶן֙ <S%H6437><s%> we turned וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תָּ֙צַר֙ <S%H6696><s%> unto me Distress אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> not the Moabites וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּתְגָּ֥ר <S%H1624><s%> neither contend בָּ֖ם מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> with them in battle כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> for I will not give לְךָ֤ מֵֽאַרְצוֹ֙ <S%H776><s%> thee of their land יְרֻשָּׁ֔ה <S%H3425><s%> [for] a possession כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children ל֔וֹט <S%H3876><s%> of Lot נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> because I have given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָ֖ר <S%H6144><s%> Ar יְרֻשָּׁה׃ <S%H3425><s%> [for] a possession

הָאֵמִ֥ים <S%H368><s%> The Emims לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> therein in times past יָ֣שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בָ֑הּ עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> a people גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great וְרַ֛ב <S%H7227><s%> and many וָרָ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> and tall כָּעֲנָקִֽים׃ <S%H6062><s%> as the Anakims

רְפָאִ֛ים <S%H7497><s%> giants יֵחָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H2803><s%> also were accounted אַף־ <S%H637><s%> are also הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> Which כָּעֲנָקִ֑ים <S%H6062><s%> as the Anakims וְהַמֹּ֣אָבִ֔ים <S%H4125><s%> but the Moabites יִקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> call לָהֶ֖ם אֵמִֽים׃ <S%H368><s%> them Emims

וּבְשֵׂעִ֞יר <S%H8165><s%> in Seir יָשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> also dwelt הַחֹרִים֮ <S%H2752><s%> The Horims לְפָנִים֒ <S%H6440><s%> beforetime וּבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> but the children עֵשָׂ֣ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau יִֽירָשׁ֗וּם <S%H3423><s%> succeeded וַיַּשְׁמִידוּם֙ <S%H8045><s%> them when they had destroyed מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> them from before וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> them and dwelt תַּחְתָּ֑ם <S%H8478><s%> their place כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> did יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> in their stead as Israel לְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> unto the land יְרֻשָּׁת֔וֹ <S%H3425><s%> of his possession אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> gave יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לָהֶֽם׃

עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now קֻ֛מוּ <S%H6965><s%> Now rise up וְעִבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> [said I] and get you over לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> the brook זָ֑רֶד <S%H2218><s%> Zered וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> And we went over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> the brook זָֽרֶד׃ <S%H2218><s%> Zered

וְהַיָּמִ֞ים <S%H3117><s%> And the space אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that הָלַ֣כְנוּ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> in which we came מִקָּדֵ֣שׁ בַּרְנֵ֗עַ <S%H6947><s%> from Kadeshbarnea עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> until אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָבַ֙רְנוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> until we were come over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> the brook זֶ֔רֶד <S%H2218><s%> Zered שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> [was] thirty וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until תֹּ֨ם <S%H8552><s%> were wasted out כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדּ֜וֹר <S%H1755><s%> until all the generation אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> of the men הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> of war מִקֶּ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> the host כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD לָהֶֽם׃

וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Moreover יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> For indeed the hand יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָ֣יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become בָּ֔ם לְהֻמָּ֖ם <S%H2000><s%> was against them to destroy מִקֶּ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> them from among הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> the host עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until תֻּמָּֽם׃ <S%H8552><s%> until they were consumed

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> came כַאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after תַּ֜מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> were consumed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַנְשֵׁ֧י <S%H582><s%> So it came to pass when all the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> of war לָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> and dead מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> That the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> unto me saying

אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> you עֹבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> Thou art to pass over הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> the coast מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָֽר׃ <S%H6144><s%> through Ar

וְקָרַבְתָּ֗ <S%H7126><s%> And [when] thou comest nigh מ֚וּל <S%H4136><s%> over against בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תְּצֻרֵ֖ם <S%H6696><s%> distress וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּתְגָּ֣ר <S%H1624><s%> them not nor meddle בָּ֑ם כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶ֠תֵּן <S%H5414><s%> with them for I will not give מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee of the land בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֤וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon לְךָ֙ יְרֻשָּׁ֔ה <S%H3425><s%> [any] possession כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> it unto the children ל֖וֹט <S%H3876><s%> of Lot נְתַתִּ֥יהָ <S%H5414><s%> because I have given יְרֻשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H3425><s%> [for] a possession

אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> a land רְפָאִ֥ים <S%H7497><s%> of giants תֵּחָשֵׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> (That also was accounted אַף־ <S%H637><s%> is also הִ֑וא רְפָאִ֤ים <S%H7497><s%> giants יָֽשְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בָהּ֙ לְפָנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> therein in old time וְהָֽעַמֹּנִ֔ים <S%H5984><s%> and the Ammonites יִקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> call לָהֶ֖ם זַמְזֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H2157><s%> them Zamzummims

עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> A people גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great וְרַ֛ב <S%H7227><s%> and many וָרָ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> and tall כָּעֲנָקִ֑ים <S%H6062><s%> as the Anakims וַיַּשְׁמִידֵ֤ם <S%H8045><s%> destroyed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> them before וַיִּירָשֻׁ֖ם <S%H3423><s%> them and they succeeded וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> them and dwelt תַחְתָּֽם׃ <S%H8478><s%> their place

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> when עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> As he did לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the children עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בְּשֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> in Seir אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> when הִשְׁמִ֤יד <S%H8045><s%> when he destroyed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֹרִי֙ <S%H2752><s%> the Horims מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> from before וַיִּֽירָשֻׁם֙ <S%H3423><s%> them and they succeeded וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> them and dwelt תַחְתָּ֔ם <S%H8478><s%> their place עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> even הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in their stead even unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וְהָֽעַוִּ֛ים <S%H5757><s%> Avims הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בַּחֲצֵרִ֖ים <S%H2699><s%> in Hazerim עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far עַזָּ֑ה <S%H5804><s%> [even] unto Azzah כַּפְתֹּרִים֙ <S%H3732><s%> the Caphtorims הַיֹּצְאִ֣ים <S%H3318><s%> which came forth מִכַּפְתּ֔וֹר <S%H3731><s%> out of Caphtor הִשְׁמִידֻ֖ם <S%H8045><s%> destroyed וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> them and dwelt תַחְתָּֽם׃ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash

אֶעְבְּרָ֣ה <S%H5674><s%> Let me pass בְאַרְצֶ֔ךָ <S%H776><s%> through thy land בַּדֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the highway בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the highway אֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will travel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אָס֖וּר <S%H5493><s%> I will neither turn יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> unto the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <S%H8040><s%> nor to the left

אֹ֣כֶל <S%H400><s%> me meat בַּכֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for money תַּשְׁבִּרֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H7666><s%> Thou shalt sell וְאָכַ֔לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> that I may eat וּמַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> me water בַּכֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for money תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and give לִ֖י וְשָׁתִ֑יתִי <S%H8354><s%> that I may drink רַ֖ק <S%H7535><s%> but אֶעְבְּרָ֥ה <S%H5674><s%> only I will pass through בְרַגְלָֽי׃ <S%H7272><s%> on my feet

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> was not אָבָ֗ה <S%H14><s%> would סִיחֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> But Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <S%H2809><s%> of Heshbon הַעֲבִרֵ֖נוּ <S%H5674><s%> not let us pass בּ֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִקְשָׁה֩ <S%H7185><s%> hardened יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> by him for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רוּח֗וֹ <S%H7307><s%> his spirit וְאִמֵּץ֙ <S%H553><s%> obstinate אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבָב֔וֹ <S%H3824><s%> and made his heart לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> order תִּתּ֥וֹ <S%H5414><s%> that he might deliver בְיָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> him into thy hand כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [appeareth] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> he ס
